query:
INSERT INTO products (name, slug, description, basePrice, categoryId, imageUrl, hasVariants, variants, isFeatured, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
('Falafel im Fladenbrot', 'falafel-fladenbrot', 'Fladenbrot, Falafel-Bällchen, Gurken, Eisbergsalat, Tomaten, Mais, Zwiebeln, Krautsalat & Peperoni (mild)', 600, 6, '/images/placeholder-falafel.jpg', true, '[{"name":"ohne Zwiebeln","price":0},{"name":"ohne Rotkohl","price":0},{"name":"ohne Eisbergsalat","price":0},{"name":"ohne Peperoni","price":0},{"name":"ohne Tomaten","price":0},{"name":"ohne Mais","price":0},{"name":"mit Käse (+0,50€)","price":50},{"name":"mit Schafskäse (+1,00€)","price":100}]', false, NOW(), NOW()),
('Falafel im Yufka', 'falafel-yufka', 'Yufka Brot, Falafel-Bällchen, Gurken, Eisbergsalat, Tomaten, Mais, Zwiebeln, Krautsalat & Peperoni (mild)', 700, 6, '/images/placeholder-falafel.jpg', true, '[{"name":"ohne Zwiebeln","price":0},{"name":"ohne Rotkohl","price":0},{"name":"ohne Eisbergsalat","price":0},{"name":"ohne Peperoni","price":0},{"name":"ohne Tomaten","price":0},{"name":"ohne Mais","price":0},{"name":"mit Käse (+0,50€)","price":50},{"name":"mit Schafskäse (+1,00€)","price":100}]', false, NOW(), NOW()),
('Falafel-Teller', 'falafel-teller', 'mit Pommes frites - Falafel-Bällchen, Pommes, Gurken, Eisbergsalat, Mais, Tomaten, Zwiebeln, Krautsalat & Peperoni (mild)', 950, 6, '/images/placeholder-falafel.jpg', true, '[{"name":"ohne Zwiebeln","price":0},{"name":"ohne Rotkohl","price":0},{"name":"ohne Eisbergsalat","price":0},{"name":"ohne Peperoni","price":0},{"name":"ohne Tomaten","price":0},{"name":"ohne Mais","price":0},{"name":"mit Käse (+0,50€)","price":50},{"name":"mit Schafskäse (+1,00€)","price":100}]', false, NOW(), NOW());
